page.title: 20THE HOLYMOORSIDE GALA
page.content:
The Holymoorside Summer Gala usually takes place during the{August Bank {Holiday}each year. The gala is an important day in the callendar of the village. In addition to a{flower show there are many{games}and{side shows. A recent attempt has been made to introduce a{Well Dressing}into the gala. The gala is organised by the {Social Amenities Improvement Fund. This organisation tries to raise money to financially assist othet societies in the village.
{-------------------------------------- Credits. {-------- The information produced has been gathered by some 5th year pupils of Hasland Hall School with the help of M.J. Franks.
